title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8129.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 31. Route
31 between Highland Avenue and Park Avenue in the Cities of Niagara Falls and

Lockport and the Towns of Niagara, Lewiston, Cambria and Lockport and the

Tuscarora Indian Reservation. (b) Route 270. Route 270 between Lockport Road and Route 93 in the Towns of

Cambria, Lockport and Pendleton. (c) [Eff. until Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (c) below.] Route 265. Route 265, River Road, between Williams Road and the

Niagara-Erie county line, in the Town of Wheatfield and City of North

Tonawanda. (c) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (c) above.] Route 265. Route 265 between the Erie-Niagara county
line and Route 104 in the City of North Tonawanda, Town of Wheatfield, City of

Niagara Falls and the Town of Niagara and Lewiston. (d) Route 78. Route 78, Transit Road, between
the Erie-Niagara county line and the south Lockport city line, in the Towns of

Lockport and Pendleton. (e) Robinson Road. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Robinson Road between

Route 78 and Bear Ridge Road, in the Towns of Lockport and Pendleton. (f) Lockport Road. The eastbound and
westbound roadways of Lockport Road between Robinson Road and Route 270 in the

Towns of Lockport and Pendleton. (g) Route 31. Route 31 between the

Orleans-Niagara county line and Kelly Avenue, in the Town of Royalton and the

Village of Middleport. (h) Route
78. Route 78 between the southern City of Lockport corporate boundary line and

Route 104 in the City of Lockport and the Town of Lockport. (i) Coleman Road. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Coleman Road between Quaker Road and Fels Road in the Town of

Somerset and the Village of Barker. (j) Route 104. Route 104 between Upper

Mountain Road and the Niagara-Orleans county line in the Village of Lewiston, and the Towns of Lewiston, Cambria, Lockport, Newfane, and Hartland and the

Tuscarora Indian Reservation. (k) Route 425. Route 425 between Route 104 and a point 4,000+- feet north of Ide

Road in the Towns of Cambria and Wilson and the Village of Wilson. (l) Route 93. Route 93 between Route 270 and

Route 104 in the Towns of Lockport and Cambria. (m) Ransomville Road. Ransomville Road
between Route 104 and Balmer Road in the Towns of Lewiston and

Porter. (n) Route 62. Route 62
between the Erie-Niagara county line and Ohio Street in the Town of Wheatfield
and the City of North Tonawanda. (o) Route 93. Route 93, the southwest

Lockport bypass between CR 123 (Robinson Road) and Route 31 in the Town of

Lockport and the City of Lockport. (p) Route 61. Route 61 between Route 104 and

Route 384 in the Village of Lewiston and the City of Niagara Falls. (r) Nash Road. Nash Road between Route 425
and US Route 62 in the City of North Tonawanda and the Town of

Wheatfield. (s) Route 425. Route
425 between US Route 62 and Route 31 in the Towns of Wheatfield and

Cambria. (t) Route 270. Route 270
between the Erie-Niagara county line and Route 104 in the Towns of Pendleton, Cambria and Lockport. (u) Route 93. Route 93 between the Erie-Niagara county line and Route 104 in the Towns of

Cambria, Lockport and Royalton, and the City of Lockport. (v) CR 123 (Lockport Road). CR 123 between

Packard Road and Route 270 in the Towns of Niagara, Wheatfield and

Cambria. (w) Route 78. Route 78
between the southern City of Lockport corporate boundary line and Route 104 in
the City of Lockport and the Town of Lockport. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8129.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
